messages.message:
Hi team, one of my customers, NWM, is trying to trigger a pipeline change that is based off the `TaskStatus.FAILED` task status. I'm trying to understand:
1. When does this status appear?
2. How can I trigger it consistently?
I've tried lowing the OCR timeout, introducing refiner errors, UDF errors but none of these seem to work.
When you introduce udf or ocr errors whats the status?
I'm not sure - we do not show the taskstatus and the current trigger is only on the `TaskStatus.FAILED` task status
For OCR timeout, no task is generated since no files are processed
UDF errors seem to complete the Task and then show the error as "ERROR" text for that field

The UDF errors don't make the job show up as failed? And I think for the OCR timeout it has to be done with a small and large record with a timeout value that doesn't timeout the short record but does for the long record so the job makes it past the pipeline assignment stage
I take that back, it looks like the task will still be completed even if some records failed. I'll defer to eng team to see whats an easy way to test this case...
